title: Mini-Ep 205: Blue Light, Da Ba Dee Da Ba Di
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 205: Blue Light, Da Ba Dee Da Ba Di
itunes:subtitle: Kate becomes a pen-head and considers getting into fountain pens, and Doree celebrates her birthday with a little second-hand joie-de-vivre. Then, together they hear from listeners concerned with pooping at work, wondering if the Ilia Blue Light Mist w...
description:
Kate becomes a pen-head and considers getting into fountain pens, and Doree celebrates her birthday with a little second-hand joie-de-vivre. Then, together they hear from listeners concerned with pooping at work, wondering if the Ilia Blue Light Mist works, and get some great news and hear about a perfect self-care day.


Activity of the week: listen to Dolly Parton’s Light of a Clear Blue Morning!


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Join us on June 7 for a live virtual happy hour! To attend, pre-order Doree's book Thanks for Waiting and register at doree-shafrir.com/pre-order.
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
